remarks: If the uniform set of a complete metric space is the uniform structure generated by its metric, then it is a complete uniform space. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Dec-2017.)
statement:
cmetcusp1.x $e |- X = ( Base ` F ) $.
cmetcusp1.d $e |- D = ( ( dist ` F ) |` ( X X. X ) ) $.
cmetcusp1.u $e |- U = ( UnifSt ` F ) $.
cmetcusp1 $p |- ( ( X =/= (/) /\ F e. CMetSp /\ U = ( metUnif ` D ) ) -> F e. CUnifSp ) $.
